name: Personas
description:
You are both a freshman and their neurotransmitter. By successfully (or not) maneuvering through their brain's jungle of synapses, electronic signals, and neurons, determine the trajectory of their high school life.

Credits:

Art (minus BGs) and Programming - Me

BGs - Internet

Sound Effects - jfxr.frozenfractal.com

Lots of help - GJ and Brian
